T02TD3746E:82a-1: a'arya dzambha la krishna s'a dha nam /
T02TD3746E:82a-3: 'phags pa dzambha la nag po sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02TD3746E:82a-4: 'phags pa dzambha la la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02TD3746E:82a-5: /'phags pa dzambha la bsgrub par 'dod pas /
T02TD3746E:82a-6: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02TD3746E:82a-7: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i go 'phang thob par byas te /
T02TD3746E:82a-8: sems can thams cad mtho ris dang thar pa'i bde ba la dgod par bya /
T02TD3746E:82a-9: de'i ched du dzambha la la chu phul la mchod par bya snyam du sems bskyed la /
T02TD3746E:82a-10: gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba ni gzhan dang mthun /
T02TD3746E:82a-11: rang gi snying gar yi ge aa dkar po 'od zer 'phro ba dang bcas pa yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD3746E:82a-12: de'i steng du yi ge h'um nang nag la la phyi ser ba /
T02TD3746E:82a-13: 'od zer ser po 'phro ba bsams la /
T02TD3746E:82a-14: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse dgu pa h'um dang kha dog mtshungs pa bsgom /
T02TD3746E:82a-15: de'i lte ba'i nang du h'um bsam /
T02TD3746E:82a-16: h'um de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros shing //
T02TD3746E:82a-17: ngag tu aom aa zhes brjod pas /
T02TD3746E:82a-18: phyogs mtshams thams cad nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i au tsushma bsam gyis mi khyab pa spyan drangs nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la /
T02TD3746E:82a-19: dang cing gus pas phyag 'tshal dngos su 'byor pa dang yid las byung ba'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i bdun rnam dag bya /
T02TD3746E:82a-20: tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pa yin /
T02TD3746E:82a-21: de nas yang rdo rje h'um /
T02TD3746E:82a-22: zla ba rnams las 'od 'phros pas snod bcud la phog / de 'od du zhu slar 'od kyi gnas la thim /
T02TD3746E:82a-23: mdun gyi 'phags pa'ang aom aa zhes brjod pas rdo rje dang h'um dang tha mi dad du gyur /
T02TD3746E:82a-24: rang lus kyang 'od du zhu nas rdo rje la sogs pa la thim /
T02TD3746E:82a-25: de rnams rmi lam sgyu ma ltar bsam /
T02TD3746E:82b-0: de @82b ye shes kyi tshogs sogs pa yin /
T02TD3746E:82b-1: rdo rje h'um zla ba autsushma h'um gi 'od zer de lnga po yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD3746E:82b-2: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i steng du rnam thos kyi bu sku mdog ser po mgo g-yas su bstan pa /
T02TD3746E:82b-4: kha nas rin po che sna tshogs skyugs pa /
T02TD3746E:82b-5: dbu rgyan la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD3746E:82b-6: de'i mgo thur du mnan pa /
T02TD3746E:82b-7: 'od zer phreng ba 'khrug cing 'phro ba'i gdan gyi lte bar /
T02TD3746E:82b-8: dbang po sbas pa ltar gnag pa'i dza yig yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD3746E:82b-9: autsushma byis pa'i gzugs can shin tu nag pa /
T02TD3746E:82b-12: skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD3746E:82b-19: phyag gnyis kyi g-yas pa na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa nu ma g-yas pa la brten cing zhal du gsol ba'i tshul gyis bsnams pa /
T02TD3746E:82b-20: g-yon pa na rin po che sna tshogs skyugs pa'i ne'u le pus mo g-yon gyi steng du bzung ba /
T02TD3746E:82b-21: zhabs g-yas bskum pas gdan gyi mgo bo mnan pa /
T02TD3746E:82b-22: g-yon brkyang bas rkang pa mnan pa /
T02TD3746E:82b-23: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa /
T02TD3746E:82b-24: gcer bu thor tshugs la klu mtha' yas nag pos dkris pa /
T02TD3746E:82b-31: rkang pa rnams la rim pa ltar /
T02TD3746E:82b-38: padma dkar po ste klu chen brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD3746E:82b-39: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje rtse dgu pa /
T02TD3746E:82b-40: de'i lte bar zla ba'i gdan la h'um /
T02TD3746E:82b-51: yi ge de rnams zla ba'i gdan dang bcas pa'o ;
T02TD3746E:82b-52: / kha dog gnag cing 'od ser po 'phro ba'o //
T02TD3746E:82b-53: yi ge de rnams dang thugs ka'i rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang gi h'um zla ba'i gdan rnams las 'od 'phros te /
T02TD3746E:82b-54: sems can la reg pas thams cad dzambha lar gyur nas yid kyis h'um la bsdu /
T02TD3746E:83a-1: bsdus te rlung nang du rngubs pas klu chen brgyad dang /
T02TD3746E:83a-3: ne'u le'i kha nang du song /
T02TD3746E:83a-4: phyir rgyu bas de rnams kyi kha nas skyugs nas rin po che'i phung po chen po byung /
T02TD3746E:83a-5: yang zos yang skyugs ba lan mang du bsgom /
T02TD3746E:83a-6: de rjes su rang gi lag pa g-yas par aom las d'a ki'i gzugs kyi lag pa'i mthil du bam yig las 'od zer 'phros pas skyes bu'i bum pa bzang po'i lag par bsams pa'i bum nang du dzam /
T02TD3746E:83a-15: re re la zla ba'i gdan re'o //
T02TD3746E:83a-16: de nas zangs gzhong la sogs pa'i nang du rten yod na bzhugs /
T02TD3746E:83a-17: med na rang dang 'dra ba'i rten mdun du bskyed la /
T02TD3746E:83a-19: aom aindra ni mu kham bhra ma ri sv'a h'a /
T02TD3746E:83a-20: zhes pa lan bdun gyis byin gyis brlab /
T02TD3746E:83a-21: chu khyor ba gang khar blugs par bsams te phul ba khang song bas /
T02TD3746E:83a-22: khong nang gi dzam gyis ser por gyur snying ga'i h'um la sogs pa'i nus pas bdud rtsir gyur pa slar gyen du log ste rang gi lag pa'i mthil du byung ba /
T02TD3746E:83a-23: mdun gyi dzambha la'i zhal du phul bar bsam zhing /
T02TD3746E:83a-24: aom dzlum sv'a h'a zhes pa lan re dang chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad rim pa 'di gnyis so //
T02TD3746E:83a-26: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02TD3746E:83a-27: na mo ma ni bha dr'a ya /
T02TD3746E:83a-28: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02TD3746E:83a-29: aom dzambha la dza le ndra ye sv'a h'a zhes lan bdun brjod la chu khyor ba bdun dbul /
T02TD3746E:83a-30: 'di nyid gtor ma'i sngags kyang yin /
T02TD3746E:83a-31: de nas rten chu nang nas bton te logs su bzhugs /
T02TD3746E:83a-32: bskyed pa yin na badzra mu:sa gshegs /
T02TD3746E:83a-35: aom dzambha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a zhes pa dang na mo ratna tra y'a ya la sogs sngas phreng 'dam kha yin gsung /
T02TD3746E:83a-36: zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub par the tshom mi dgos gsung /
T02TD3746E:83a-37: rjes su bdag gzhan thams cad kyi tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba dang /
T02TD3746E:83a-40: 'dod pa'i don ci dang ci bsams pa thams cad myur du 'grub par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba gdab bsngo ba dang smon lam bya'o //
T02TD3746E:83b-0: dzambha la nag @83b po'i sgrub thams bsdus pa pan chen sh'akya shr'i'i zhal nas gsungs pa /
T02TD3746E:83b-1: gnubs lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o //
T02TD3746E:83b-2: sa brgyad dbang phyug lha yi lha //
T02TD3746E:83b-3: mgon po 'gro kun phongs pa sel //
T02TD3746E:83b-4: mi'u thung gzugs can nag po che //
T02TD3746E:83b-6: zhes pa'i bstod pas bstod par bya'o//
